metadata.title: Sweden Relocators
metadata.description: Relocate to Sweden with expert advice

hero.description: We provide comprehensive relocation and immigration support for individuals, employees, and companies, covering residence permits, housing, school placements, and integration all seamlessly managed through our secure web and mobile platform across Sweden, Denmark, and the wider Nordic region.

countrySelector.subtitle: From your home today to your home tomorrow

services.badge: Empowering your skills to relocate and succeed in the Nordics
services.title: Trusted Legal Relocation Solutions For Individuals
services.subtitle: Move To and From Sweden

business.title: Relocate for Business
business.description: We help you establish a business or franchise in Sweden with full support, including residence permit guidance. To qualify, you'll need a solid business plan, investment capital, and sufficient funds for two years.

family.title: Relocating for Family Reunification
family.description: Under Directive 2004/38/EC and Swedish national laws, EU citizens and their family members have the right to reunite and reside together in Sweden. We provide guidance throughout the reunification process to ensure compliance and a smooth relocation.

work.title: Relocating with a Work Permit
work.description: We assist you in securing a work permit in Sweden, guiding both employers and employees through every step of the process. To qualify, you'll need a valid job offer, employment contract, and compliance with salary and insurance requirements.

parents.title: Dependent Parents Relocation
parents.description: We know the importance of having your parents close. Through family reunification, we help bring dependent parents to Sweden or other Nordic countries, ensuring they receive the care and support they need.

study.title: Relocating for Study in Sweden
study.description: We support you in applying for a residence permit to pursue studies in Sweden. To qualify, you'll need admission to a recognized program, proof of financial means, and valid health insurance.

ltr.title: Relocating with LTR Permits
ltr.description: If you hold a long-term residence permit in another EU country, you may have the right to move to Sweden with your family. Family reunification rules allow eligible relatives to join you.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Welcome To SWEDEN RELOCATORS AB
hero.description: SWEDEN RELOCATORS AB was established in 2015.

whoWeAre.label: Who We Are
whoWeAre.title: Your Trusted <blue>Relocation</blue> Partner
whoWeAre.p1: Founded in 2015, Sweden Relocators AB specializes in providing tailored relocation and mobility solutions for individuals and organizations moving to Nordic countries. We simplify the process of settling into a new country by offering comprehensive services that cater to both employers and employees. Whether you're relocating for work, education, or investment opportunities, we ensure a seamless transition with services like Destination Assistance, Global Mobility Solutions, Immigration Support, Move Management, and Property Management.
whoWeAre.p2: Our web- and app-based portal provides an innovative solution for managing relocations. Employers can oversee the progress of employee transfers, while employees can track applications, explore housing and schools, and manage expenses efficiently - all in one place.

employer.title: Employer Solutions
employer.description: We assist employers in managing the complexities of relocating their workforce. Services include:
list: Global Mobility Program Design: Tailored strategies for organization-wide compliance.
Visa and Work Permit Assistance: Expert support for streamlined immigration processes.
Move Coordination: Handling logistics, household goods shipment, and housing for employees and their families.
Cultural Integration Programs: Workshops and training to help employees adapt smoothly.

employee.title: Employee Solutions
employee.description: For individuals and their families, we provide end-to-end support to ease their transition, including:
list: Immigration Services: Assistance with visa applications and residence permits.
Housing and School Search: Access to housing options and schools based on lifestyle, budget, and preferences.
Orientation and Settling-In Support: Language courses and cultural orientation training.
Digital Relocation Tools: Real-time updates and financial management through our app and portal.

nordic.title: Nordic Relocators - Denmark
nordic.p1: Expanding our expertise across the Nordic region, Nordic Relocators offers specialized services for moving to Denmark. Whether you're relocating an entire team or a single employee, we provide tailored solutions to address Denmark's specific requirements. From visa applications to housing and cultural integration, our services are designed to ensure a successful move.
nordic.p2: At Sweden Relocators AB and Nordic Relocators, we're committed to making every relocation efficient, stress-free, and rewarding, helping both employers and employees thrive in their new Nordic environment.

student.title: Student Admission Services
student.description: Assistance in choosing the right degree program and residence permit processing for international students.

work.title: Work & Business
work.description: Assistance in registering a business, buying a new business, and preparing work permit applications for employees and employers.

family.title: Family Relocation
family.description: We provide assistance in your family visa processing including your dependent parents and other family members.

investment.title: Investment Solutions
investment.description: There are various opportunities for business ventures, look for the best opportunity to build your future.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Find us at your nearest location, or reach us digitally anytime through our web and app.

formSection.title: Our Services for a Seamless <blue>Move to Sweden</blue>
formSection.heading2: We'll be glad to hear from you, buddy.

hero.subtitle: Your Digital Gateway To Relocation & Immigration Services
hero.description: We are delivering seamless solutions for individuals and businesses within one secure platform

sectionHeading.badge: Clear Guidance, Right Support, Your Path Forward

cards.description: Guidance for family permits based on EU freedom of movement rules.

cards.description: Specialised programmes for business, investment and relocation planning.

cards.title: Swedish Citizenship

cards.description: Holistic solutions for au pairs, host families and supportive placements.

cards.title: Appeal Cases

cards.title: Destination Services
cards.description: Orientation, local registrations and settling-in support on arrival.

cards.title: Housing Solutions
cards.description: Short- and long-term housing search with landlord coordination.

cards.title: Buy / Sell Property
cards.description: Guidance across the full property purchase or sale lifecycle.

cards.title: Bookkeeping Solutions
cards.description: Accounting and bookkeeping services for individuals and companies.

cards.title: EOR & Payroll
cards.description: Employer of record and compliant payroll for your Swedish workforce.

cards.title: Financial Management
cards.description: End-to-end financial oversight and reporting for your operations.

cards.title: Lawyers Assistance
cards.description: Access to legal expertise for complex relocation and immigration matters.

cards.title: Manpower Solutions
cards.description: Recruitment and staffing solutions tailored to Nordic markets.

cards.title: Employee Management
cards.description: HR, onboarding and ongoing employee support in Sweden.

cards.title: Logistics Management
cards.description: Coordinated logistics for your move, shipments and relocations.

cards.title: Pet Relocation
cards.description: Safe and compliant relocation of pets with full documentation support.

cards.title: Invest in Sweden - Business Sale Purchase
cards.description: Expert guidance for acquiring or selling businesses in Sweden with full legal and financial support.

howToStart.badge: Our complete digital solutions are designed for both
howToStart.title: Individual Clients & Corporate Organizations

individual.title: How To Start - Individual
steps: Download the app or create an account on our website
Book a consultation session to get the help you need
Onboard with us â€“ sign service agreement
Pay your invoice and upload the required documents
Check your application status & contact your rep if needed
individual.note: To get started, we recommend using our assessment tool to check your basic eligibility.
individual.subNote: Let us simplify your relocation journey

company.title: How To Start - Company
steps: Create an account on our website
Easily add employees, manage their profiles, and choose the services you need
Real-time access and coordination for employees and companies
Other services available like: bookkeeping, job posting, business, or property listing
Share access across your team in the correct department
company.note: Select the correct type during sign-up so we can better understand your needs.

digitalPlatforms.heading: Our All-in-One Digital Platforms for Individuals and Companies
digitalPlatforms.subheading: Seamless Relocation & Immigration solutions for Employees, Individuals, Families, & Companies
digitalPlatforms.description: Our app and web portal provide a complete end-to-end relocation and immigration solution for individuals and companies. Services include Man Power Solutions, Visa Tracking, Eligibility Assessments, Compliance Management, Housing Solutions, Payroll, Logistics, Health insurances, Pet Relocation, and Full Departure-to-Arrival support and many more. All of this is managed in one secure platform, accessible anytime via web or mobile.

visaTracking.title: Visa & Permit Tracking
visaTracking.desc: Track your visa and residence permit applications in real-time. Get instant updates on application status, processing times, and required documents with full transparency.

documentManagement.title: Secure Document Management
documentManagement.desc: Store, organize, and share all your immigration documents securely in one place. Upload documents, e-sign forms, and access your files anytime from any device.

housingSolutions.title: Housing & Accommodation
housingSolutions.desc: Find and secure housing before you arrive. Browse verified listings, schedule virtual tours, and complete rental agreements all through our platform.

complianceManagement.title: Compliance & Support
complianceManagement.desc: Stay compliant with immigration regulations. Receive automated reminders for permit renewals, tax registrations, and other important deadlines with 24/7 expert support.
